entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
